item.title: Report E-2024050355
item.description:
Report E-2024050355

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-16
  • City: SHELBY
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ESTES EXPRESS LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Clean Harbors was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted a 8ft-by-1ft area of the trailer floor and estimated that five (5) gallons of material was released due to improper loading of the freight that damaged two (2) 5-gallon metal pails. Clean Harbors personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area and then gathered the spent material. The recovered impacted absorbents were containerized into one (1) 55-gallon metal drum. The generated waste was transported offsite for disposal. The ESTES DGRM team to coordinate disposal.
